name: Realistic Visual Style
description: Photorealistic and natural appearance with authentic textures, lighting, and proportions

prompt.base: Photorealistic style, natural lighting, authentic textures, realistic proportions, lifelike details, accurate physics, true-to-life colors, documentary quality, unfiltered reality
prompt.positive: photorealistic, 8k resolution, ultra detailed, natural skin texture, realistic lighting, accurate proportions, lifelike eyes, authentic materials, real-world physics, natural shadows, true colors, high detail, sharp focus, professional photography
prompt.negative: stylized, cartoon, anime, illustration, painting, artistic interpretation, exaggerated features, unrealistic proportions, fantasy elements, CGI look, artificial appearance

technical.rendering: Photorealistic rendering with accurate light physics
technical.textures: High-resolution realistic textures with proper subsurface scattering
technical.lighting: Physically accurate lighting with natural falloff

variations.name: Cinematic Realism
variations.modifier: film grain, cinematic color grading, professional cinematography, shallow depth of field

variations.name: Documentary Realism
variations.modifier: natural lighting, candid moments, unposed subjects, authentic environments

variations.name: Hyperrealism
variations.modifier: extreme detail, perfect clarity, enhanced textures, ultra-sharp focus

examples: A portrait with natural skin texture, realistic eye reflections, natural lighting, photographic quality, lifelike details
An urban street scene with accurate perspective, realistic materials, natural shadows, authentic atmosphere
